text: Patient with fever, headache, body pain for 3 days. Diagnosed as viral fever. Recommended rest, hydration, paracetamol.
Patient with chest tightness, breathlessness while walking. Possible cardiac issue. Advised immediate ER visit.
Patient with stomach pain after eating street food. Diagnosed as gastric infection. ORS, probiotics recommended.
Patient with persistent cough and weight loss. Suggested TB testing and chest X-ray.
Patient with dizziness, low BP, dehydration. Recommended ORS, salts, monitor vitals.
